required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Prospective Study Comparing the Outcomes of Single Versus Group Culture in Preimplantation Genetic Testing Cycles
clinical_study.official_title: A Prospective Study Comparing the Outcomes of Single Embryo Culture Versus Group Culture in Preimplantation Genetic Testing Cycles

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this study is to analyze whether there is difference in the effect of single embryo culture and group culture in preimplantation genetic screening (PGS) cycle, and provide reference for the feasibility of the clinical application of medium-based noninvasive PGD. This prospective study prepares for more than 1,000 normal fertilized zygotes in each group over one year period. For the recruited patients, all normal fertilized zygotes were randomly allocated into two groups: cultured individually in 25 ul media or 2-3 embryos cultured together in 50 ul media. The blastocyst formation rates, aneuploid rates, clinical pregnancy rates, implantation rates and miscarriage rates will be compared between the two groups.

primary_outcome.description: number of blastocysts with high quality divided by number of zygotes with normal fertilization

secondary_outcome.time_frame: about one month after blastocyst biopsy
secondary_outcome.description: number of euploid blastocysts divided by all blastocysts detected

secondary_outcome.time_frame: about three to six months after blastocyst biopsy
secondary_outcome.description: number of gestational sacs divided by number of embryo transferred

arm_group.description: Embryo is cultured individually in 25 ul media
2-3 Embryos are group cultured in 50 ul media

intervention.description: Single embryo culture means only one embryo is cultured in one drop, and the group culture refers to culture of 2-5 embryos in one drop. The main advantage of group culture may be secreting some paracrine cytokines by embryos and benefit each other; and the possible disadvantage of group culture is that embryo secreting of some harmful substances which accumulated to a certain extent will damage the developmental potential of embryos. The advantages and disadvantages of single embryo culture are contrary to group culture.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- patients treated by preimplantation genetic diagnostic / screening cycles
Exclusion Criteria:
- number of normal fertilization zygotes is less than 6

overall_official.affiliation: Reproductive and Genetic Hospital of Citic-xiangya

facility.name: Reproductive and Genetic Hospital of Citic-xiangya
